Name: Royal Brisbane_TOFMRA_Intracranial Aneurysm_Database

HowToAcknowledge: If using this dataset, please cite our paper: "Time-of-Flight MRA of Intracranial Aneurysms with Interval Surveillance, Clinical Segmentation and Annotations", doi: https://doi.org/10.1038/s41597-024-03397-8
